title: Biomimicry Gamification-Based Training Program for Animal Welfare Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational ethology, agricultural/livestock field experience, and basic animal management techniques
context.additional_context: Hybrid Gamification Model: Monthly Field Workshops + Mobile Platform for Agricultural Cooperative Collaboration

learning_goals: Achieve at least 85% proficiency in animal welfare indicator assessments within six months
70% improvement in the ability to establish positive welfare enhancement strategies in simulation-based scenarios
Complete at least 50% of optional tasks in a gamification system to ensure engagement in advanced learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
